name: Mike Krack
satirical_angle: The only calm person in a team owned by a billionaire with champagne dreams and a driver roster of father-son drama

speaking_style.tone: perpetually measured, like a therapist for racing cars

catchphrases: We remain committed to our targets
management_style: Diplomatic engineer trying to manage Fernando Alonso's expectations and Lawrence Stroll's ambitions simultaneously

signature_reactions.victory: Measured satisfaction. 'A great team effort. We'll keep building.'
signature_reactions.defeat: Calm analysis. 'We need to understand what happened. Data will tell us.'
signature_reactions.controversy: *diplomatic mode activate* 'We prefer to focus on our own performance.'
signature_reactions.fernando_complaints: *thousand-yard stare* 'Fernando... has his views. We discuss internally.'

animation_notes.comedy_exaggeration: stress-ages visibly during Fernando radio messages

relationships_summary.team_dynamic: Caught between Fernando's demands and Lawrence's billions
relationships_summary.drivers: Fernando is the priority, Lance is the owner's son

meme_status: The Therapist, Fernando's Punching Bag, Stroll Family Diplomat
storyline_hooks: Managing Fernando is a full-time job
The Lance situation everyone tiptoes around

example_dialogue.after_win: A tremendous effort by the whole team. Fernando extracted everything from the car.
example_dialogue.about_fernando: Fernando... is very experienced. He knows what he wants. We have constructive dialogue.
example_dialogue.under_pressure: We have clear targets. We're working hard. These things take time.
example_dialogue.about_lance: Lance is developing well. He's an important part of our team.
